name: Platinum Package
detailedDescription: Experience a seamless wedding journey with our Platinum Package. It includes comprehensive wedding planning services to bring your vision to life and top-tier photography and videography to capture every cherished moment.

name: Luxury Combo
shortDescription: Indulge in luxury dining and arrival.
detailedDescription: Treat your guests to a sumptuous dining experience with our Catering Services and arrive at your wedding venue in style with our Transportation options. It's the perfect combination of luxury and convenience.

name: Floral Fantasy
shortDescription: Create a floral wonderland for your wedding.
detailedDescription: Transform your wedding venue into a floral wonderland with our Venue Decoration and Floral Arrangements package. It includes stunning decor and exquisite floral designs to add natural beauty to your celebration.

name: Entertainment Extravaganza
shortDescription: Ensure non-stop fun and a grand entrance.
detailedDescription: Keep your guests entertained throughout the event with our Entertainment options and make a grand entrance at your wedding venue with our Transportation services. It's an extravaganza of entertainment and style.

name: Bridal Beauty
shortDescription: Achieve a stunning bridal look and capture it forever.
detailedDescription: Enhance your natural beauty with our Makeup & Hairstyling services and have your bridal beauty captured in style with our Photography & Videography. It's the perfect package for a beautiful and lasting memory.
